action_description: This action will stop recording of a camera you specify
This action will start broadcasting the camera you specify.
This action will create an event from the specified sensor. All other settings (sensor name, type, site, arming, ...) are managed at Angelcam platform.
This action will disarm RTS causing that no sensor connected to Angelcam will trigger security incident.
This action will arm RTS causing that you will receive notifications about security incidents based on your notifications settings.
This action will start recording of a camera you specify
This action will stop broadcasting the camera you specify.
